sections.title: Calendar View Help
sections.intro: The Calendar View helps you easily track and manage bookings by date and status.

features.title: Navigating Months
features.description: Use the left (‚Üê) and right (‚Üí) arrow buttons at the top to move between months.

features.title: Viewing Bookings by Status
features.description: Click the filter button (funnel icon) to select which booking status to display: All, Confirmed, Pending, Cancelled, or Done.

features.title: Understanding Calendar Cells
features.description: Each cell represents a day. The number badge shows booking count for the day. Colored labels indicate booking status counts.

features.title: Viewing Booking Details
features.description: Click on a day with bookings to see a preview. Click on a booking preview to open detailed information.

features.title: Today's Highlight
features.description: The current day is outlined in blue for easy identification.

features.title: Loading Indicator
features.description: A spinning icon appears when bookings are loading.

notes.title: Pro Tip
notes.content: Click on any booking to see comprehensive details including customers information, venue details, and booking status.

sections.title: Add Booking Help
sections.intro: The Add Bookings page allows you to create new bookings for customers.

features.title: Select Customer
features.description: Choose between new or existing customers

subsections.title: Existing Customer
bullets: Search by name, email, phone, or NIC

features.title: Fill Booking Information
features.description: Complete all required fields
bullets: Indicate if key money deposit is paid

features.title: Submit the Booking
features.description: Click 'Add Booking' to create the booking. A confirmation message will appear upon success.

features.title: Status Bar
features.description: The status bar shows selected customers, their ID, and booking status.

notes.title: Important Notes
bullets: You must select or add a customers before creating a booking
All required fields must be filled to submit

sections.title: Venue Management Help
sections.intro: The View Venues page allows you to manage all venue information.

features.title: Viewing Venues
features.description: All venues are listed in a table with details such as name, time slot, location, capacity, price, and more.

features.title: Adding a New Venue
features.description: Create a new venue entry
bullets: Fill venue details in new row
Click 'Add' to save or 'Cancel' to discard

features.title: Editing a Venue
features.description: Update existing venue information
bullets: Click 'Update' to save or 'Cancel' to discard

features.title: Deleting Venues
features.description: Remove venues from the system

features.title: Searching Venues
features.description: Use the search box to filter venues by name or details.

notes.title: Important Considerations
bullets: Cannot delete venues with active bookings

sections.title: Booking Analysis Help
sections.intro: The Booking Analyze page helps you review, search, and analyze all bookings in detail.

features.title: Filtering Bookings by Status
features.description: Use status filter at top to view by status (All, Confirmed, Pending, Cancelled, Done).

features.title: Searching Bookings
features.description: Use search box to find bookings by customers name, booking ID, etc.

features.title: Viewing Booking Details
features.description: Interact with booking records
bullets: Click any booking row to view details
Detailed view shows all relevant information

features.title: Booking Details Modal
features.description: Modal provides in-depth booking information. Close to return to list.

notes.title: Analytical Tips
bullets: Combine filters and search for precise results
Use status filters to analyze conversion rates
Review seasonal trends by filtering date ranges
